name: pawpal_backend
description: This module handles the construction of the system prompt for the PawPal AI Assistant. It takes structured pet data and the user's question, then injects them into the strict safety-focused system prompt.

scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const dbUrl = process.env.DATABASE_URL || ''; if (dbUrl.startsWith('postgres') || dbUrl.startsWith('postgresql')) { fs.copyFileSync('prisma/schema.postgres.prisma', 'prisma/schema.prisma'); console.log('Build: Using PostgreSQL'); } else { fs.copyFileSync('prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma', 'prisma/schema.prisma'); console.log('Build: Using SQLite'); } execSync('npx prisma generate', { stdio: 'inherit' });" && tsc
scripts.start: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); let dbUrl = process.env.DATABASE_URL || ''; let env = { ...process.env }; if (dbUrl.startsWith('postgres') || dbUrl.startsWith('postgresql')) { fs.copyFileSync('prisma/schema.postgres.prisma', 'prisma/schema.prisma'); console.log('Start: Using PostgreSQL'); } else { fs.copyFileSync('prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma', 'prisma/schema.prisma'); console.log('Start: Using SQLite'); if (dbUrl && !dbUrl.startsWith('file:')) { env.DATABASE_URL = 'file:' + dbUrl; console.log('Start: Fixed SQLite protocol'); } else if (!dbUrl) { env.DATABASE_URL = 'file:./prisma/dev.db'; console.log('Start: Using fallback SQLite path'); } } execSync('npx prisma db push', { stdio: 'inherit', env });" && node dist/server.js
